targets.query: SELECT max(*) FROM "CPU" WHERE ("service"::tag =~ /^$service$/ AND "testEnvironment"::tag =~ /^$testEnvironment$/ AND "systemUnderTest"::tag =~ /^$systemUnderTest$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "testEnvironment" WHERE "systemUnderTest" =~ /$systemUnderTest/
list.name: testEnvironment
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "testEnvironment" WHERE "systemUnderTest" =~ /$systemUnderTest/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "service" WHERE "systemUnderTest" =~ /$systemUnderTest/ AND "testEnvironment" =~ /$testEnvironment/
list.name: service
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "service" WHERE "systemUnderTest" =~ /$systemUnderTest/ AND "testEnvironment" =~ /$testEnvironment/
